entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:56 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:56 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
